H0.text: What was the Russian City of Nizhny Novgorod called between 1932 and 1990. Rybinsk

H1.text: What was the Russian City of Nizhny Novgorod called between 1932 and 1990. Sverdlovsk

H2.text: What was the Russian City of Nizhny Novgorod called between 1932 and 1990. Leningrad

H3.text: What was the Russian City of Nizhny Novgorod called between 1932 and 1990. Gorky

A4.text: From 1932 to 1990, the city was known as Gorky.

A5.text: During the Soviet period, the city was known as Gorky.
